pr_title: Elide 5: Add HJSON table filter templates

timeline.message: Initial plumbing plus some unit tests
changed plumbing to serialize the RSQL filters in table
Made Serdes injectable.  Added plumbing to enforce table filter templates.  Added tests
Added support for table filters with non template values

timeline.bodyText: Unrelated improvement to make Serdes injectable.
timeline.author: aklish
